text: Andrzej Konopka (1 September 1934 - 26 March 1999) was a Polish gymnast. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Polish male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Poland Category:Gymnasts at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:People from Sandomierz Category:Sportspeople from Świętokrzyskie Voivodeship
title: Andrzej Konopka
